subject: Automobile Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Stepney leaked nearly 800 pages of confidential Ferrari information to the British Formula One rival in 2007, and was convicted in Italy of sabotage and sporting fraud.
snippet: Mr. Stepney leaked nearly 800 pages of confidential Ferrari information to the British Formula One rival in 2007, and was convicted in Italy of sabotage and sporting fraud.
